anya-e1203n:302: Gantvā so dhammarājā vanamisipatanaṁ saññatānaṁ niketaṁ,
anya-e1203n:310: Obhāso pātubhuto sapadi bahuvidhaṁ āsi accherakañca.
anya-e1203n:313: Tato paṭṭhāya so satthā vinento devamānuse,
anya-e1203n:319: Yakkhānaṁ samitiṁ gantvā ṭhatvāna gagane tahiṁ;
anya-e1203n:335: Datvā namassituṁ kese agā jetavanaṁ jino.
anya-e1203n:380: So satthā sumane kūṭe dassesi padalañchanaṁ.
anya-e1203n:413: Subhaddaṁ majjhime yāme pāpetvā amataṁ padaṁ.
anya-e1203n:427: Ahatehi ca vatthehi veṭhetvā paṭhamaṁ jinaṁ;
anya-e1203n:440: Citakaṁ taṁ na sakkhiṁsu gāhāpetuṁ hutāsanaṁ.
anya-e1203n:449: Na masi satthudehassa daḍḍhassāsi na chārikā.
anya-e1203n:454: Uṇhīsaṁ akkhakā dve ca catasso dantadhātuyo;
anya-e1203n:455: Iccetā dhātuyo satta vippakiṇṇā na satthuno.
anya-e1203n:476: Gantvā sake sake raṭṭhe cetiyāni akārayuṁ.
anya-e1203n:481: Dantadhātuṁ tato khemo attanā gahitaṁ adā;
anya-e1203n:484: Desayitvāna so dhammaṁ bhetvā sabbā kudiṭṭhiyo;
anya-e1203n:562: Taṁ dhātuṁ pūjayitvāna rājāno pubbakā idha;
anya-e1203n:566: Pūjayanti samāgamma dhātuṁ taṁ satthuno iti.
anya-e1203n:568: Tassāmaccassa so rājā sutvā dhammaṁ subhāsitaṁ;
anya-e1203n:571: Dhātupūjaṁ karonto so rājā acchariyā vahaṁ;
anya-e1203n:578: Pabbājesi sakā raṭṭhā nigaṇṭhe te asesake.
anya-e1203n:593: Nindanno tādise deve chavaṭṭhiṁ vandate iti.
anya-e1203n:599: Pūjitaṁ taṁ chavaṭṭhiñca tena rattindivaṁ iti.
anya-e1203n:607: Sutvā āgamanaṁ tassa kaliṅgo so mahipati;
anya-e1203n:616: Tato so sumano gantvā paviṭṭho rājamandiraṁ;
anya-e1203n:632: Jano hi avajānanto addhā so vañcito iti.
anya-e1203n:638: Tena saddhiṁ mahagghaṁ taṁ agamā dhātumandiraṁ.
anya-e1203n:684: Accheraṁ taṁ parama ruciraṁ cittayāno narindo,
anya-e1203n:691: Taṁ sāsanaṁ paṇḍunarādhipassa ñāpesi dhīro duratikkamaṁ’ti.
anya-e1203n:693: Rājātato dantapuraṁ dhajehi pupphehi dhūpehi ca toraṇehi;
anya-e1203n:697: Samubbahanto sirasā nijena mahārahaṁ dhātukaraṇḍakaṁ taṁ.
anya-e1203n:708: Kaliṅghanātho kusumādikehi naccehi gītehi ca vāditehi;
anya-e1203n:709: Dine dine addhani dantadhātuṁ pūjesi saddhiṁ vanadevatāhi.
anya-e1203n:712: Ādāya dhātuṁ manujādhinātho agā puraṁ pāṭali puttanāmaṁ.
anya-e1203n:714: Rājādhirājo’tha sabhāya majjhe disvāna taṁ vītabhayaṁ visaṅkaṁ;
anya-e1203n:724: Mohandhabhutā atha titthiyā te taṁ dantadhātuṁ abhinikkhipiṁsu.
anya-e1203n:729: Tasmiṁ khaṇe paṅkaja kaṇṇikāya patiṭṭhahitvā jinadantadhātu;
anya-e1203n:730: Kundāvadātāhi pabhāhi sabbā disā pabhāsesi pabhassarāhi.
anya-e1203n:732: Disvāna taṁ acchariyaṁ manussā pasannacittā ratanādikehi;
anya-e1203n:735: So paṇḍurājā pana diṭṭhijālaṁ cirānubaddhaṁ apariccajanto;
anya-e1203n:739: Pubbācalaṭṭho’va sudhāmarīci jotesi raṁsīhi disā samantā.
anya-e1203n:741: Disvānubhāvaṁ jinadantadhātu yāpajji so vimbhaya maggarājā;
anya-e1203n:742: Eko’tha issāpasuto nigaṇṭho taṁ rājarājānamidaṁ avoca.
anya-e1203n:744: Rāmādayo deva janaddanassa nānāvatārā bhuvane ahesuṁ;
anya-e1203n:747: Addhā manussattamupāgatassa devassa pacchā tidivaṁ gatassa;
anya-e1203n:754: Yaṭicchitaṁ gaṇhatha vatthujātaṁ iccāha rājā mukhare nigaṇṭhe.
anya-e1203n:756: Te titthiyā viṇahusuraṁ guṇehi vicitta rūpehi abhitthavitvā;
anya-e1203n:757: Toyena siñciṁsu saṭhā tathāpi ṭhitappadesā na calittha dhātu.
anya-e1203n:759: Jigucchamāno atha te nigaṇṭhe so dhātuyānīharaṇe upāyaṁ;
anya-e1203n:760: Anvesamāno vasudhādhinātho bheriṁ carāpesi sake puramhi.
anya-e1203n:766: Tasmiṁ pure seṭṭhisuto subhaddo pāvekkhirañño samitiṁ pagabbho.
anya-e1203n:768: Tamaggarājaṁ atha so namitvā sāmājikānaṁ hadayaṅgamāya;
anya-e1203n:771: Bhumiṁ kiṇitvā mahatā dhanena manoramaṁ jetavanaṁ vihāraṁ;
anya-e1203n:772: Yo kārayitvāna jinassa datvā upaṭṭhahi taṁ catupaccayehi.
anya-e1203n:780: Chaddantanāgo savisena viddho sallena yo lohitamakkhi taṅgo;
anya-e1203n:781: Chabbaṇṇaraṁsīhi samujjalante chetvāna luddāya adāsi dante.
anya-e1203n:786: Yo bodhiyā bāhiravatthudānā atittarūpo sivirāja seṭṭho;
anya-e1203n:787: Adāsi cakkhūni pabhassarāni dvijāya jiṇṇāya acakkhukāya.
anya-e1203n:792: Yo dhammapālo api sattamāsa jātopaduṭṭhe janakesakamhi;
anya-e1203n:793: Kārāpayante asimālakammaṁ cittaṁ na dūsesi patāparāje.
anya-e1203n:795: Sākhāmigo yo asatā pumena vane papātā sayamuddhaṭena;
anya-e1203n:796: Silāya bhinne’pi sake lalāṭe taṁ khemabhumiṁ anayitthamūḷhaṁ.
anya-e1203n:799: Samuṭṭhite sajjumahāravinde ṭhatvāna yo seṭṭhi adāsi dānaṁ.
anya-e1203n:804: Yo sattavasso visikhāya paṁsu kīḷāparo sambhavanāmako’pi;
anya-e1203n:807: Hitvā nikantiṁ sakajīvite’pi baddhāsakucchimhi ca vettavalliṁ;
anya-e1203n:811: Isī’va katvā atha ñāyaganthaṁ nijaṁ pavattesi cirāya dhammaṁ.
anya-e1203n:825: Buddho bhavitvā api diṭṭhadhamma sukhānapekkho karuṇānuvattī;
anya-e1203n:829: Ajeyyasatthaṁ paramiddhipattaṁ damesi yo ālavakampī yakkhaṁ.
anya-e1203n:832: Bhetvāna diṭṭhiṁ sucirānubaddhaṁ damesi yo brahmavaraṁ munindo.
anya-e1203n:838: Mahādayo duppasahaṁ parehi damesi yo aṅgulimālacoraṁ.
anya-e1203n:841: Saddhamma saññaṁ ratanākarañca ogāhayī saṁ parisaṁ samaggaṁ.
anya-e1203n:846: Anena saccena jinassa dhātu khippaṁ samāruyha nabhantarāḷaṁ;
anya-e1203n:849: Tasmiṁ khaṇe sā jinadantadhātu nabhaṁ samuggamma pabhāsayantī;
anya-e1203n:850: Sabbā disā osadhitārakā’va janaṁ pasādesi vtiṇṇakaṅkhaṁ.
anya-e1203n:852: Athotaritvā gaganaṅgaṇamhā sā matthake seṭṭhisutassa tassa;
anya-e1203n:855: Dasvāna taṁ acchariyaṁ nigaṇṭhā iccabravuṁ paṇḍunarādhipaṁ taṁ;
anya-e1203n:856: Vijjābalaṁ seṭṭhisutassa etaṁ na dhātuyā deva ayampabhāvo.
anya-e1203n:858: Nisamma tesaṁ vacanaṁ narindo iccabravī seṭṭhisutaṁ subhaddaṁ;
anya-e1203n:859: Yathā ca ete abhisaddaheyyuṁ tathāvidhaṁ dassaya iddhimaññaṁ.
anya-e1203n:864: Sā rājahaṁ sī’va vidhāvamānā sugandhitoyamhi padakkhiṇena;
anya-e1203n:865: Ummujjamānā ca nimujjamānā jane pamodassudhare akāsi.
anya-e1203n:867: Tato ca kāsuṁ visikhāyamajjhe katvā tahiṁ dhātumabhikkhipitvā;
anya-e1203n:868: Paṁsūhi sammā abhipūrayitvā bahūhi maddāpayi kuñjarehi.
anya-e1203n:874: Obhāsayanti’va disā pabhāhi diṭṭhā muhuttena jinassadhātu.
anya-e1203n:876: Khipiṁsu vatthābharaṇāni maccā pavassayuṁ pupphamayañca vassaṁ;
anya-e1203n:877: Ukkuṭṭhisaddehi ca sadhukāranādehi puṇṇaṁ nagaraṁ akaṁsu.
anya-e1203n:879: Te titthiyā taṁ abhivañcanaṁ’ti rājādhirājaṁ atha saññapetvā;
anya-e1203n:880: Jigucchanīye kuṇapādikehi khipiṁsu dhātuṁ parikhāya piṭṭhe.
anya-e1203n:883: Madhubbatālī virutābhirāmā ahosi sā pokkharaṇī’va nandā.
anya-e1203n:885: Gajādhipā koññcaravaṁ raviṁsu kariṁsu hesāninadaṁ turaṅgā;
anya-e1203n:889: Vatthāni sīse bhamayiṁsu mattā bhujāni poṭhesumudaggacittā.
anya-e1203n:895: Atthe niyojetu mupecca tassa vadiṁsu paṇḍussa narādhipassa.
anya-e1203n:897: Disvāna yo īdisakampi rāja iddhānubhāvaṁ munipuṅgavassa;
anya-e1203n:898: Pasādamattampi kareyya noce kimatthiyā tassa bhaveyya paññā.
anya-e1203n:900: Pasādanīyesu guṇesu rāja pasādanaṁ sādhujanassa dhammo;
anya-e1203n:901: Pupphanti sabbe sayameva vande samuggate komudakānanāni.
anya-e1203n:903: Vācāya tesaṁ pana dummatīnaṁ mā saggamaggaṁ pajahittha rāja;
anya-e1203n:904: Andhe gahetvā vicareyya ko hi anvesamāno supathaṁ amūḷho.
anya-e1203n:906: Narādhipā kappiṇa bimbisāra suddhodanādi api tejavantā;
anya-e1203n:907: Taṁ dhammarājaṁ saraṇaṁ upecca piviṁsu dhammāmatamādarena.
anya-e1203n:910: Upecca dhammaṁ vimalaṁ nisamma alattha āyuṁ api diṭṭhadhammo.
anya-e1203n:916: Senāpatiṁ atthavaraṁ avoca pahaṭṭhabhāvo parisāya majjhe.
anya-e1203n:919: Cirāya dulladdhipathe caranto ṭhito sarajje api vañcitohaṁ.
anya-e1203n:921: Mohena khajjopanakaṁ dhamesiṁ sītaddito dhumasikhe jalante;
anya-e1203n:922: Pipāsito sindhujalaṁ pahāya piviṁ pamādena marīcitoyaṁ.
anya-e1203n:924: Pariccajitvā amataṁ cirāya jivatthiko tikkhavisaṁ akhādiṁ;
anya-e1203n:927: Gantvāna khippaṁ parikhā samīpaṁ ārādhayitvā jinadantadhātuṁ;
anya-e1203n:928: Ānehi pūjāvidhinā karissaṁ puññāni sabbattha sukhāvahāni.
anya-e1203n:931: Dhātuṁ munindassa namassamāno ajjhesi rañño hitamā caranto
anya-e1203n:933: Cirāgataṁ diṭṭhimalaṁ pahāya alattha saddhaṁ sugate narindo;
anya-e1203n:936: Tasmiṁ khaṇe pokkharaṇī vicittā phullehi sovaṇṇasaroruhehi;
anya-e1203n:940: Kundāvadātāhi pabhāhi sabbaṁ khirodakucchiṁ’va puraṁ akāsi.
anya-e1203n:943: Sandissamānā mahatā janena mahapphalaṁ mānusakaṁ akattha.
anya-e1203n:954: Vīmaṁsanatthāya tavādhunāpi mayā kataṁ sabbamidaṁ muninda;
anya-e1203n:955: Āguṁ mahantaṁ khama bhuripañña khippaṁ mamālaṅkuru uttamaṅgaṁ.
anya-e1203n:957: Patiṭṭhitā tassa tato kirīṭe maṇippabhā bhāsini dantadhātu;
anya-e1203n:958: Amuñci raṁsī dhavalā pajāsu sinehajātā iva khīradhārā.
anya-e1203n:964: Patiṭṭhapetvāna jinassa dhātuṁ pūjesi rājā ratanādikehi.
anya-e1203n:967: Hitvā vihiṁsaṁ karuṇādhivāso ārādhayī sabbajanaṁ guṇehi.
anya-e1203n:972: Vaḍḍhesi so dhātugharamhi dhātuṁ alaṅkaritvā sakalaṁ purampi;
anya-e1203n:973: Sesena pūjāvidhinā atitto pūjesi raṭṭhaṁ sadhanaṁ sabhoggaṁ.
anya-e1203n:1020: Nikhila guṇa nivāso so kumāro karitvā;
anya-e1203n:1051: Nahi sati mama dehe dhātumaññassa dassaṁ,
anya-e1203n:1052: Ahamapi yadi jetuṁ neva te sakkuṇeyyaṁ.
anya-e1203n:1059: Tavaca mamaca ko vā sīhaḷe bandhubhūto,
anya-e1203n:1069: Mama ca piyasahāyo so mahāsena rājā,
anya-e1203n:1087: Turita turita bhūto so puramhā paḷāyi.
anya-e1203n:1258: Itthaṁ buddhisute bhujaṅgajanitaṁ bhītiṁ sametvā gate,
anya-e1203n:1259: Sā nāvā pavanā pakampitadhajā tuṅgaṁ taraṅgāvaliṁ;
anya-e1203n:1287: Sabbā disā ca vidisā ca ghanandhakārā
anya-e1203n:1483: Sabbe’pi te atha nikāya nivāsi bhikkhū,
anya-e1203n:1489: Rājā avo ca puna bhikkhugaṇassa majjhe;
anya-e1203n:1550: Tuṭṭhā tahiṁ yatigaṇā manujā ca sabbe,
